data.message: It was one of the best concerts I'd been to in a minute ;-p I hope everyone who went and were involved behind the scenes had a ball, like our group did ;-) I managed to hold onto my battered and bruised ticket, which surprised me cause I usually take better care of them! However, I feel an Eminem mosh pit ticket would not look right all crisp and clean! Take care till next time xTx

replies.message: it was one of the best concerts ever hey

I had a ball! The new album really reminds me of the old school issues with a fresh perspective! I'm really glad Mr M played some old beats though, it was awesome to hear the Shady classics ;-) I made a mix of the old and the new album together and they just flow smoothly xTx
